Content:
[telegram] <Mixic> Throughout this process, the Graviex.net exchange has stayed completely on top of things, updating and getting in sync shortly after even the 0.6.0-3 release. 
They reopened withdrawals and deposits sometime last night for trading, with BTC, KMD, and USD markets. 
With that level of support, maybe a few more in our community should give them a shot as well.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <TheCrabbyPaddy> Payment for dPoW. More tx/s needed on a chain, more chains needed, more dPoW payments. 
Instant 0 confirmation trades if kmd as collateral
Kmd will be main coin of ecosystem so naturally has most liquidity etc and useage in trading as main pair
Kmd : stablecoin creation (recently being worked on)
Kmd being bought to pay out to DEX, or other Kmd assets, so buying pressure 
That‚Äôs a few off the top of my head

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <Acura360> In August 2019, Komodo introduced nSPV technology, the next generation of Simple Payment Verification (SPV). This new nSPV technology is hundreds, or in some cases even thousands, of times more efficient than traditional Electrum SPV server methods.
As development continues on nSPV, several additional features are emerging.
Read more here.
https://komodoplatform.com/advancing-nspv-technology/
